staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000010: (안함)Oh! I...I didn't expect to see you here...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000020: (안함)Uh... How did you even get here? Those devices are one time use and rather hard to make...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000040: (안함)I just wanted to bring ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; back, you know?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000050: (안함)We all wanted that, but he just wouldn't come...kept talking about duty in his letters...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000060: (안함)It was really hard to build something that could transfer objects from place to place!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000100: (안함)At least one of you came willingly...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000140: (안함)It's hard to see him so distressed.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000150: (안함)Perhaps it was truly wrong of me to drag him back. Maybe he'll come back of his own free will someday...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000160: (안함)Alright. I'll help you. It won't be easy though...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000170: (안함)We didn't want him to run away so we moved him somewhere...special...for the time being.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000180: (안함)If you could get me a few items I should be able to pull together something that will whisk you past the barrier.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000190: (안함)There should be ^c:d03e37;five components^c:pop;. If you look around the ^c:1486b0;tree houses^c:pop; here you should find them.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000200: (안함)We shouldn't be seen talking until you find the ^c:d03e37;five components^c:pop;.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000210: (안함)It would be bad if they suspected something was happening...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000220: (안함)Yes, this looks like everything we need!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000230: (안함)Now if you just give me a minu-
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000240: (안함)I apologise, the device initiated before I was quite ready.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000250: (안함)I hope I didn't cause you too much unnecessary concern...?
